title: Do Not Taunt Happy Fun Bloggers
summary: Wow. Missed this from Mark over the weekend, and then further missed Sam's link to it and the subsequent whirling mass of shitstorm that rolled past in its wake. Well, at least everyone just ends up being an asshole in the end, and no nazis or ethnicities or monsters were invoked in the process. And no one co-opted any acronyms, though I think someone got ketchup on their tie. Hope it wasn't silk. And does anyone know if all us assholes are actually alive or dead in Schroedinger's Trunk?
